hero.title: Industrial Edge Intelligence
hero.subtitle: Realtime machine insight, without complexity or lock-in
description: We are building a new generation of industrial intelligence: scalable, affordable and designed to run directly at the edge — close to machines, processes and operations.

Our platform enables OEMs, manufacturers and asset owners to gain real-time insight into machine health, energy behaviour and operational performance — without complex IT projects or dependency on large cloud platforms.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Making advanced industrial AI accessible — without cloud dependency
paragraphs: Our mission is to make advanced AI and machine learning accessible to every production company.

Too often, industrial intelligence is tied to expensive hardware, heavy cloud infrastructures and external platforms that create long-term dependency and limit control. We believe industrial organisations should retain ownership of their data, their models and their operational decisions.

By using affordable edge technology and on-device intelligence, we enable organisations of any scale to improve efficiency, reduce energy costs, extend asset lifetime and improve product quality — while keeping full control over their data and systems.
In doing so, we accelerate both the digitalisation and the sustainability of the manufacturing industry.

building.title: What We Are Building
building.subtitle: An integrated edge-native platform for machine health and intelligence
building.description: We are developing an Industrial Edge Intelligence Platform, a fully integrated system, that brings machine monitoring, anomaly detection and digital-twin capabilities directly to the production floor.
list: Multi-sensor edge hardware (current, vibration, temperature, vision-ready)
On-device anomaly detection using TinyML and Edge AI
Secure dashboards for machine health and operational insight
Rapid deployment in harsh industrial environments
A scalable foundation for predictive maintenance and digital twins
building.footer: The result is a system that grows in intelligence over time — without increasing operational complexity.

delivery.title: How We Deliver This
delivery.subtitle: Plug-and-play SaaS, no upfront investment required
paragraphs: Our solution is delivered as a plug-and-play SaaS platform.

Edge sensor nodes are installed directly on machines or infrastructure. Intelligence runs locally on the device, and only relevant insights are transmitted. Dashboards provide immediate visibility into machine health and performance.
There are no large upfront investments. Customers subscribe to the platform and scale usage as value is proven.
This makes advanced industrial AI accessible, financially predictable and aligned with operational reality.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From raw signals to actionable insight — at the edge — Edge-First Intelligence by Design
paragraphs: Edge sensor nodes capture machine behaviour directly at the source. TinyML models analyse this data locally and detect deviations and anomalies in real time, even in environments with limited connectivity.

Only relevant insights and health indicators are transmitted, keeping bandwidth usage, storage requirements and cloud dependency to a minimum. Dashboards provide clear, actionable views for operations and maintenance teams.
As data accumulates, models mature and enable predictive maintenance and digital-twin applications.

differentiation.footer: This allows organisations to start small, validate quickly and scale with confidence — without committing to heavy infrastructure or external platforms.

whyItMatters.subtitle: Reliability, cost control and sustainability in one system — Operational, Financial and Sustainability Impact
paragraphs: Industrial reliability is not only a technical challenge — it is a financial and sustainability challenge.
Every unplanned stop, wasted kilowatt-hour and prematurely replaced component increases costs and environmental impact.

team.title: Team & Credibility
team.subtitle: Industrial experience combined with deep AI expertise
paragraphs: Controlable is built by a multidisciplinary team combining:
Our team combines deep industrial experience with advanced AI and embedded systems expertise.

We bring together senior engineers with decades of experience in industrial automation, embedded systems and machine reliability; specialists in Edge AI and TinyML building models that operate on constrained hardware in real-world conditions; system architects experienced in deploying technology in live industrial environments; and a new generation of highly skilled engineers and graduates trained in modern software, data and AI methodologies.
This combination enables us to move fast while maintaining industrial-grade robustness.

Our advisory board further strengthens this foundation, covering manufacturing from large corporate to sme’s, cutting edge digital twins, AI and machine learning applied academic research, legal structuring and financial strategy.
